com.mr_apps.androidbase.account

Class BaseLoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PermissionManagerActivity
        • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.LocationActivity

            • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.AbstractBaseActivity
              • com.mr_apps.androidbase.account.BaseLoginActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener

    public abstract class BaseLoginActivity
extends AbstractBaseActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Abstract Base class that manages a login activity, that should be extended by a real Login Activity

        public abstract boolean passwordTilRule(java.lang.String s)
        Abstract method that should be override by the subclasses to sets the rules that defines when the password should be considered correct or not
        Parameters:
        s - the current password contained in the password edit text
        Returns:
        true if the password is currently valid, false otherwise
